sentence.Network_en: And the saint replied , " I too am a thief and a plunderer. "
sentence.Network_cn: 圣人: “ 我也是个贼人,是个强盗. ”

sentence.Network_en: And the brigand said, " But I a thief and a plunderer. "
sentence.Network_cn: 盗贼: “ 可我是个贼人,是个强盗. ”
